column4: I'm having a problem installing to a local HD from LiveCD.  When I get to the partitioner, and try to go through 'guided, largest free space', it displays that it is going to take up 100% of the disk.  When I hit next, it doesn't 'guide' me.  And I don't want to overwrite the other partitions on that drive
do a manual install.  the guided means it chooses the partition setup for you.
I've got 30GB, what would the recommended partition sizes and mount points be?
i've done ubuntu on paritions as small as 10gb.  but that doesn't leave a lot of wiggle room for downloading much.
